metadata.title: CVE-2024-26735 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:sr: fix possible use-after-free and null-ptr-deref The pernet operationsstructure for the subsystem must be registered before registering thegeneric netlink family.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
